questions.question: 2. In GenBank format, the sequence begins from

answers.c: the line containing greater than symbol (>)

questions.question: 3. SQ tag is found in which of the following sequence format?
4. Which among these databases is not considered a nucleic acid sequence database?
5. Which file format will provide information regarding coding sequence?
6. SQ (SeQuence header) in EMBL format indicates.

answers.c: General descriptive information about the sequence stored.
answers.d: Mechanism for the annotation of the sequence data.

answers.c: Both annotation section and sequence section
